en.title: What is GreenScore?
text: GreenScore is a web application based on an engaging online questionnaire, focusing on ecological themes. Inspired by purity and personality tests, GreenScore highlights 20 questions about situations related to ecological lifestyle. By using a playful and informative approach, our goal is to raise awareness among users about the impact of their daily choices on the environment.

Each question is carefully crafted so that every user can relate to the situation, covering various aspects of daily life such as energy consumption, waste management, or modes of transportation. The objective is to provide a holistic evaluation of each individual's ecological footprint.
GreenScore is not just an online questionnaire; it's an interactive exploration of each person's impact on the planet, an invitation to awareness and commitment towards a greener future and world!
